venue.name: Tavern at the End of the World

item.description:
Lets hang out with Element Brewing for their launch of Plasma, a double IPA brewed with an Imperial quantity of Aramis Hops, malted millet, and brown rice, making this beer is part Sake and part aggressive Double IPA, clocking in at 9.3% ABV and over 60 IBUs.

Please RSVP on Eventbrite to save your spot: http://plasmabeer-meetup.eventbrite.com/

The last meetup at Tavern at the End of the World was awesome, and I think this one can top it! Free appetizers for the first hour, and 3 other Element Beers including an oak aged ale, an 11.5% ABV wheat wine, and an oatmeal stout/pilsner fusion. Pretty crazy!

Try to wear something red to find other Meetupers.

Don't forget to RSVP, and we'll see you there! http://plasmabeer-meetup.eventbrite.com/
item.name: New Sake Double IPA "Plasma" Release Party with Element Brewing!
